name: Pizza Mizza
description:
Deliver pizzas to the delivery zones! Deliver as fast as you can to get the highest score!

CONTROLS

  • Move the mouse vertically to balance the pizzas
  • Move the mouse horizontally to turn
  • 'Z' to brake
  • 'Space' to Jump
  • 'R' to reset

TIPS

  • Move the mouse smoothly to go faster.
  • Use the brake to turn fast. 
  • Moving faster when you deliver gives you more points.

Authors

James Graham-Hu
Robert Graham-Hu
Samuel Dresser
